title: [HOLD for payment 2023-10-13] [$500]  Login - Enter key does not submit recovery code
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to [https://staging.new.expensify.com](https://staging.new.expensify.com/sign-in-with-google)
2. Enter the email of an account with 2FA enabled.
3. Enter magic code
4. Click Use recovery code
5. Enter any incorrect code
6. Hit Enter

Expected result: Enter key submits the recovery code. Error will show up

Actual result: None
